alert.note: Alert for Eastern Payette National Forest; Western Payette National Forest (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 21 at 10:03PM MDT until August 22 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...SCATTERED THUNDERSTORMS EXPECTED ACROSS THE PAYETTE NATIONAL FOREST MONDAY AFTERNOON... .An upper level trough will move onshore over the Pacific Northwest on Monday. This will result in scattered thunderstorms across the Payette National Forest Monday afternoon with abundant lightning possible. Greatest thunderstorm coverage is expected to be north and east of the McCall area. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT MONDAY AFTERNOON FOR LIGHTNING FOR WESTERN PAYETTE NATIONAL FOREST AND EASTERN PAYETTE NATIONAL FOREST...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 401 AND 402... * THUNDERSTORMS...scattered. * OUTFLOW WINDS...40-50 mph.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Payette National Forest; Western Payette National Forest
